resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158280</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158280</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1029</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Animal World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierwelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monde Animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mundo Animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mondo Animale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωικός κόσμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mundo Animal</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity, the learners will be introduced to some of the endangered and threatened animals and their habitats in different continents around the world. They will be asked to present information to the class about the animal, its habitat, why it is endangered and how to improve its situation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">endangered animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">threatened animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität werden die Anfänger zu 
einigen der gefährdeten und bedrohten Tiere und ihrer Lebensräume in
den unterschiedlichen Kontinenten um die Welt eingeführt. Sie 
werden gebeten, Informationen der Kategorie über das Tier, seinen 
Lebensraum darzustellen, warum es gefährdet wird und wie man seine 
Situation verbessert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité, les étudiants seront 
présentés à certains des animaux mis en danger et menacés et de 
leurs habitats dans différents continents autour du monde. Ils 
seront invités à présenter l'information à la classe au sujet de 
l'animal, son habitat, pourquoi il est mis en danger et comment 
améliorer sa situation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade, os learners serão introduzidos a
alguns dos animais postos em perigo e ameaçados e de seus habitats em
continentes diferentes em torno do mundo. Serão pedidos para 
apresentar a informação à classe sobre o animal, seu habitat, 
porque é posto em perigo e como melhorar sua situação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività, i principianti saranno 
introdotti ad alcuni degli animali messi e minacciati e dei loro 
habitat in continenti differenti intorno al mondo. Saranno 
chiesti di presentare le informazioni al codice categoria circa 
l'animale, il relativo habitat, perchè è messo e come migliorare la 
relativa situazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα, οι αρχάριοι θα εισαχθούν 
σε μερικά από τα διακυβευμένα και απειλητικά ζώα και τους 
βιότοπούς τους στις διαφορετικές ηπείρους σε όλο τον κόσμο. 
Θα κληθούν να παρουσιάσουν τις πληροφορίες στην κλάση για το
ζώο, ο βιότοπός του, γιατί διακυβεύεται και πώς να βελτιώσει 
την κατάστασή του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad, introducirán a los 
principiantes a algunos de los animales puestos en peligro y 
amenazados y de sus habitat en diversos continentes alrededor del 
mundo. Les pedirán presentar la información a la clase sobre 
el animal, su habitat, porqué se pone en peligro y cómo mejorar su 
situación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gefährdete Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bedrohte Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animaux mis en danger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animaux menacés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animais postos em perigo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animais ameaçados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividade interativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animali messi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animali minacciati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività interattiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διακυβευμένα ζώα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απειλητικά ζώα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική δραστηριότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">animales puestos en peligro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">animales amenazados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividad interactiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
